@@ -450,1 +450,3 @@
-  # Macosx is osx and x86_64 is x64
+  # The macOS bundle name was revised in JDK 17
+  #
+  # macosx is macos and x86_64 is x64
@@ -452,1 +454,1 @@
-    OPENJDK_$1_OS_BUNDLE="osx"
+    OPENJDK_$1_OS_BUNDLE="macos"

@@ -601,1 +601,0 @@
-    //
@@ -603,3 +602,0 @@
-    //
-    // Macosx bundles are named osx
-    // tar.gz.
@@ -614,1 +610,1 @@

+            platform: "jacos-x64",
